application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Detailed drawings of the new external doors and typical windows including relationship to reveals (1:20, with details at 1:5), a typical glazed bay from floors 1-4 of the front façade (1:20, with details at 1:5), the entrance porch/bay (1:20, with details at 1:5), location of all movement joints across each façade and detailed design of these joints, all new metal railings (1:10), appearance of front lightwell, including appearance of balcony and plant screens (1:20 or 1:10), glazed rooflights and associated soft landscaping to rear part of site (1:20 or 1:10), ventilation and other services terminations at façade/roof (1:10), treatment of interface between the new development, herein approved, and remaining adjacent buildings, namely 23-24 Buckingham Gate and 29 Buckingham Gate pursuant to condition 18 (i), (ii), (iii), (iv), (v), (vi)(vii), (viii), (ix) of planning permission dated 23rd January 2024 (RN:23/02516/FULL)
